name: Starlab
description:
STARLAB

Collect colored stars to move the blocks of that color (no Android or iPhone support)

  • 10-15 minutes playtime
  • 8 levels
  • Game jam: Dani's Basement Jam

Controls:

  • WASD : simple top-down movement
  • ESC: Pause

CREDITS:

  • Only creator stelk
  • Kenney asset's (for platforms asset's)
  • Top-Down Sci-Fi Pixel Art Tileset (tilemap inspiration)
  • Music by youtube ;)
